cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("ip_location")

	IP_LOCATION("geo", "ip").DATABASE_FILE("GeoLite2-Country.mmdb")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: ip_location
processors:
  - ip_location:
      tag: ip_location_ip_into_geo_bca05132
      field: ip
      target_field: geo
      database_file: GeoLite2-Country.mmdb
